title: Secret Society Orgy
description: Heading back to her billionaire boss' estate late one night to grab some files, Julia stumbles into a situation she could never imagine. Her boss is hosting a secret society party, which includes sexual debauchery as the main course. When Julia becomes the center attraction, only Derek can save her.  The Billionaire's Son 4 : Secret Society Orgy is a ~7,000 word erotic romance which contains explicit depictions of sexual acts including bdsm, a hedonistic sexual ritual and a sexy billionaire playboy behaving badly . This story is intended for an adult audience only!
author: Arabella Quinn
